name: Shattered Crowns S1: RPGM Adaptation
description:
[This is only a demo! Many portions are incomplete.]

"The Skarab Lords have slept for a thousand years, but now they have begun to awaken. Five unsuspecting adventurers will now face the secret threat beneath the sands and walk the path of inheritance. "

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

This game is an adaptation of the Dungeons and Dragons Campaign "Shattered Crowns" ran by "Arcadum".  The original can be found on Arcadum's Youtube and Twitch.
